ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 16 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 4096 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 16 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) x 4 (packed FP16) = 16384 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.tf32: 16 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 128 ops/TC/clock = 8192 TF32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 16 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 512 ops/TC/clock = 32768 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1300 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Ampere GPU with 2048 CUDA cores (16 SMs) and 64 Tensor Cores (Gen 3). 2x GPU vs Orin Nano. Shares LPDDR5 memory with CPU.
